item.title: Updated Next James Bond Odds Reveal Highly Competitive New Contender For 26th 007 Film
item.description: The odds regarding who will be the next 007 in James Bond 26 have just been updated, and a new contender has emerged as a likely choice.

item.title: The Adventures Of Priscilla, Queen Of The Desert Sequel: Confirmation, Cast & Everything We Know
item.description: The Oscar-winning cult film The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert is getting a long-awaited sequel and the original cast will return.

item.title: "Who Has Time For Charades?": James Gunn Addresses The Batman 2 Cancellation Conspiracy Theories
item.description: James Gunn has addressed concerns about The Batman - Part II being canceled, with the director providing a new update on the status of the DC movie.
